description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft Windows Codecs Library information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38055):

1. Apply the appropriate KB updates for your operating system version by visiting the links below.
2. Restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses improper input validation that could lead to information disclosure vulnerabilities.
- Ensure your system is running the corresponding build number, as listed below:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3880 (Install KB5040442)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.3880 (Install KB5040442)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: 10.0.22000.3079 (Install KB5040431)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4651 (Install KB5040427)

**Update Packages**:
- [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
- [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that your system is running one of the supported build versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
